entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Genius Scan Enterprise - PDF
entry.content:
Discount Information

Compras integradas

  • Genius Scan UltraÔºö44,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 5,99¬†‚Ç¨ [5,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 44,99¬†‚Ç¨]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö59,99¬†‚Ç¨

Compras integradas

  • Genius Scan UltraÔºö5,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • Ponta super grandeÔºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • Doa√ß√£o generosaÔºö2,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • Pequena doa√ß√£oÔºö0,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

O Genius Scan √© um scanner de bolso. Digitalize rapidamente seus documentos em qualquer lugar e exporte-os como arquivos JPEG ou PDF de v√°rias p√°ginas. *** Apple App of the Week *** mais de 20 milh√µes de usu√°rios *** milhares de pequenas empresas *** Posicione qualquer documento em frente √† c√¢mera do seu dispositivo: nosso aplicativo digitalizador reconhecer√° o papel contra o fundo, cortar√° sua imagem e limpar√° o resultado. Voc√™ obter√° uma digitaliza√ß√£o n√≠tida e leg√≠vel. A digitaliza√ß√£o em lote permite que voc√™ digitalize dezenas de p√°ginas em apenas alguns segundos. Ferramentas poderosas ajudam a organizar, compartilhar ou arquivar seus documentos. "Na pr√≥xima vez que voc√™ planejar viajar, n√£o se esque√ßa de baixar uma c√≥pia do Genius Scan para facilitar sua vida e a do departamento de contabilidade." - AppPicker.com "Os aplicativos de c√¢mera n√£o foram projetados para digitalizar textos de perto, mas o Genius Scan sim." - The Guardian == ENTERPRISE EDITION == Pacote Genius Scan+ Premium: - Todos os recursos premium do Genius Scan+ (indicados com + abaixo), prontos para usar (sem necessidade de atualiza√ß√£o). Configura√ß√£o gerenciada: - Implanta√ß√£o em frotas de dispositivos por uma ferramenta MDM - Defini√ß√£o pr√©via das configura√ß√µes do aplicativo por usu√°rio (por exemplo, definir endere√ßo de email padr√£o, credenciais de WebDAV/FTP) - Controle de quais aplicativos e servi√ßos para os quais os usu√°rios podem exportar documentos - Sem an√∫ncios == PRINCIPAIS RECURSOS == Digitaliza√ß√£o inteligente: - Detec√ß√£o de documento e remo√ß√£o de fundo - Corre√ß√£o de distor√ß√µes - Remo√ß√£o de sombras e limpeza de imperfei√ß√£o - Filtros (preto e branco, quadro branco, foto) - Digitaliza√ß√£o em lote Cria√ß√£o e edi√ß√£o de PDF: - Mescla e divis√£o de documentos - Cria√ß√£o de PDF multip√°ginas - Importa√ß√£o de fotos e PDF Seguran√ßa e privacidade: - Processamento de documentos no dispositivo + Face ID + Criptografia de senha no PDF Organiza√ß√£o de documentos: - Identifica√ß√£o de documentos - Pesquisa de metadados e conte√∫do + Esquemas personalizados de nomenclatura (Smart Document Names) + Backup e sincroniza√ß√£o multidispositivos da Genius Cloud (assinatura em separado) Exporta: - Email + Box, Dropbox, Evernote, Expensify, Google Drive, iCloud Drive, OneDrive, OneNote, FTP, SugarSync, WebDAV. + Qualquer servi√ßo compat√≠vel com WebDAV, como Citrix ShareFile, NextCloud, ownCloud, Synology, Yandex. + Exporta√ß√£o autom√°tica de fundo OCR (Reconhecimento de texto): + Extra√ß√£o de texto + Cria√ß√£o de PDFs pesquis√°veis + Leitura de cart√µes de visita e cria√ß√£o de contatos == QUEM SOMOS == √â no cora√ß√£o de Paris, na Fran√ßa, que The Grizzly Labs desenvolve o Genius Scan. Nos orgulhamos por criarmos aplicativos que ajudam milh√µes de usu√°rios em todo o mundo, e que nos colocam nos mais altos padr√µes de qualidade e privacidade. Entre em contato conosco @thegrizzlylabs se tiver alguma d√∫vida. == PRE√áOS E LEGAIS == Voc√™ pode se inscrever no Genius Cloud para backup e sincroniza√ß√£o. Nesse caso, a loja da Genius Scan exibe a dura√ß√£o e o pre√ßo de cada assinatura, atualizados no momento da compra. O pagamento ser√° cobrado na conta do iTunes quando o pedido for confirmado. As assinaturas s√£o renovadas automaticamente, a menos que a renova√ß√£o autom√°tica seja desativada at√© 24 horas antes do final do per√≠odo atual. Gerenciar assinaturas, desative a renova√ß√£o autom√°tica nas configura√ß√µes da conta do iTunes. https://www.thegrizzlylabs.com/genius-scan/cloud/terms

entry.title: Video Cacher
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö2,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí Gratuito [Gratuito ~ 2,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöGratuito

Application Description

Feature 1: Can be used to cache videos from most websites Feature 2: When the desktop mode is selected, you can open the computer version of the webpage Feature 3: Block unfriendly advertisements, such as malicious pop-up windows that affect the experience Feature 4: Mute the webpage, do not disturb listening to music while browsing the webpage video Feature 5: Dark Mode Feature 6: Cast screen to TV or Mac computer Feature 7: Copy the text in the video (requires iOS 16.2 or above) Feature 8: Mark the cached videos as favourites for easy viewing of good videos Feature 9: Screen always-on mode to prevent interruption of background caching

entry.title: Cytus II
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö1,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí Gratuito [Gratuito ~ 1,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

Compras integradas

  • 9 CharactersÔºö39,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 29,99¬†‚Ç¨ [29,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 39,99¬†‚Ç¨]
  • CAPSOÔºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 3,99¬†‚Ç¨ [3,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 9,99¬†‚Ç¨]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöGratuito

Compras integradas

  • MikuÔºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • 9 CharactersÔºö29,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • CAPSOÔºö3,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • AromaÔºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • ConneRÔºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • IlkaÔºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • XenonÔºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • AmiyaÔºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • AliceÔºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • CherryÔºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

"Cytus II" is a music rhythm game created by Rayark Games. It's our fourth rhythm game title, following the footsteps of three global successes, "Cytus", "DEEMO" and "VOEZ". This sequel to "Cytus" brings back the original staff and is a product of hardwork and devotion. In the future, humans have redefined internet development and connections. We can now easily sync the real world with the internet world, changing life as we have known for thousands of years. In the mega virtual internet space cyTus, there exists a mysterious DJ legend √Üsir. His music has an irresistible charm; people fall madly in love with his music. Rumor has it that every note and beat of his music hits the audiences in the depths of their souls. One day, √Üsir, who had never shown his face before, suddenly announced that he will be holding the first mega virtual concert ‚Äî‚Äî √Üsir-FEST and will invite a top idol singer and a popular DJ as opening performances. The instant the ticket sales began, an unprecedented rush occurred. Everyone wanted to see √Üsir's real face. On the day of the FEST, millions of people were connected to the event. At one hour before the event started, the previous world record for most simultaneous connection was smashed. The whole city was on its feet, waiting for √Üsir to descent from the skies... Game Features: - The unique "Active Judgement Line" rhythm game playstyle Tap the notes as the judgement line hits them to achieve a high score. Through five different kinds of notes and the judgement line that actively adjusts its speed according to the beat, the gameplay experience is further combined with the music. Players can easily immerse themselves in the songs. - A total of 250+ high-quality songs (50+ in base game, 200+ as IAP) The game includes songs by composers from all across the world, Japan, Korea, the US, Europe, Taiwan and more. Through the characters, players get to play songs from different genres including but not limited to: electronic, rock and classical. We are confident that this game will live up to the hype and expectations. - Over 800 different charts Over 800 different charts designed, from easy to hard. The rich game content can satisfy players of different levels. Experience exciting challenges and enjoyment through the sensation of your fingertips. - Explore the virtual internet world with the game's characters The one-of-a-kind story system "iM" will lead the players and the in-game characters to slowly piece together the story and world behind "Cytus II". Reveal the truth of the story with a rich, cinematic visual experience. PAFF (CV:‰∏äÂùÇ„Åô„Åø„Çå Sumire Uesaka) NEKO (CV:Ëä±ÂÆà„ÇÜ„Åø„Çä Yumiri Hanamori) Xenon (CV:Èñ¢Êô∫‰∏Ä Tomokazu Seki) ConneR (CV:Á´πÂÜÖÊ†ÑÊ≤ª Eiji Takeuchi) Cherry (CV:„Éï„Ç°„Ç§„É´„Éº„Ç∫„ÅÇ„ÅÑ Fairouz Ai) Nora (CV:Áü≥Ë¶ãËàûËèúÈ¶ô Manaka Iwami) Ivy (CV:Ê≤≥ÁÄ¨ËåâÂ∏å Maki Kawase) Vanessa (CV:Ê•†Êú®„Å®„ÇÇ„Çä Tomori Kusunoki) Rin (CV:ËÉΩÁôªÈ∫ªÁæéÂ≠ê Mamiko Noto) ************************************************************* Cytus II will perform a connection authentication for its In-app purchases from time to time. If you discover during the authentication period that your IAP was lost due to your device not connecting to the internet, please make sure your device is connected to the internet. Afterwards, click "Restore Purchases" to recover your IAP. ************************************************************* ‚Äª This game contains mild violence and vulgar language. Suitable for users age 15 and above. ‚Äª This game contains additional in-app purchases. Please purchased base on personal interest and ability. Do not overspend. ‚Äª Please pay attention to your game time and avoid addiction. ‚Äª Please do not use this game for gambling or other illegal purposes.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

  • DLC de recursosÔºö2,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • Her√≥is montadosÔºö2,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

"The End of Han Dynasty" requer que a vers√£o do sistema seja iOS 16 e superior e use iPhone 7 ou 7Plus, iPhone 8 ou 8 Plus, iPhone X e superior, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 4, iPad 2017 ou qualquer iPad Pro para jogar. Introdu√ß√£o do jogo "Tr√™s Reinos: Hegemonia no Fim da Dinastia Han" √© um jogo SLG baseado em turnos cuidadosamente produzido pelo Longyou Tianxia Studio. √â baseado principalmente no novo pensamento das pessoas e na nova perspectiva do jogo Tr√™s Reinos para criar um mundo diferente dos Tr√™s Reinos. Com base no retorno √† categoria de estrat√©gia tradicional, ele retrata profundamente as diferen√ßas regionais entre as cidades dos tr√™s pa√≠ses e as semelhan√ßas e diferen√ßas das pr√≥prias capacidades e caracter√≠sticas de cada comandante militar. Em termos de combate, destaca o encanto de combinar a hora certa, o lugar certo e a implanta√ß√£o de pessoas. Funcionalidades do jogo Um: estilo cl√°ssico de bordado com desenho de linha branca, simples e elegante As cabe√ßas dos personagens adotam o estilo e a cor do bordado em linha branca da cl√°ssica hist√≥ria em quadrinhos "Romance dos Tr√™s Reinos". A interface do jogo adota o estilo antigo e o design com charme antigo, aut√™ntico estilo chin√™s. Dois: modo de gest√£o governamental simples e f√°cil de usar: Arranjos b√°sicos de assuntos internos, explora√ß√£o de pessoal, reconhecimento militar e desenvolvimento de tecnologia adotam um modo de gerenciamento de posicionamento para reduzir opera√ß√µes tediosas e repetitivas e permitir que os jogadores se concentrem em outros eventos. No modo de jogo monarca, os jogadores s√≥ precisam prestar aten√ß√£o √† gest√£o da capital e do pa√≠s. Outras cidades s√£o entregues ao prefeito. Use a pol√≠tica para dar diferentes instru√ß√µes militares e pol√≠ticas para a subcidade. Tr√™s: configura√ß√µes de conte√∫do de jogo extremamente ricas: De 184 a 280 DC, mais de 1.300 generais (incluindo generais hist√≥ricos e hist√≥ricos) apareceram em cena. As capacidades b√°sicas de 30 generais s√£o divididas e as capacidades dos generais s√£o diferenciadas em detalhes. Mais de 300 configura√ß√µes independentes das caracter√≠sticas dos generais, totalmente destacar as diferen√ßas individuais dos generais. Existem mais de 500 itens e cen√°rios de tesouro com evid√™ncias de pesquisa. Uma variedade de classifica√ß√µes √© dividida para atender a diferentes prefer√™ncias. Quase mais de 60 tipos diferentes de cidades, mais de 200 caracter√≠sticas urbanas bem documentadas e produtos especiais. Ricos itens de desenvolvimento t√©cnico e suporte em todo o sistema de jogo. Reflete a import√¢ncia da for√ßa cient√≠fica e tecnol√≥gica. As seis armas b√°sicas e mais de uma d√∫zia de armas especiais constituem um rico sistema de armas. Sistema super rico de cargos oficiais e t√≠tulos nobres. O sistema de casamento apontado pelo monarca e o sistema de treinamento e heran√ßa infantil humanizado. V√°rios fen√¥menos naturais e desastres de eventos simulam o per√≠odo conturbado dos Tr√™s Reinos. Muitas for√ßas estrangeiras e bandidos e bandidos precisam de voc√™ para esmag√°-los e elimin√°-los. Uma riqueza de visitas, mercadores, imortais, celebridades, m√©dicos, mestres artes√£os, espadachins vagam por a√≠, desencadeando v√°rios eventos funcionais. Quatro: Retorne ao sistema cl√°ssico de combate baseado em turnos, com foco na forma√ß√£o estrat√©gica de tropas A introdu√ß√£o do clima, topografia e alturas dos blocos destaca com mais destaque a influ√™ncia dos fatores de tempo e localiza√ß√£o na guerra. entry.title: Little Big Workshop
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 1,99¬†‚Ç¨ [1,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 9,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö1,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

Imagine uma f√°brica m√°gica bem na sua sala. Uma obra de arte cuidadosamente planejada, onde funcion√°rios dedicados criam qualquer coisa que os clientes desejarem. Patos de borracha e c√¥modas, drones e guitarras el√©tricas, patinetes e outras coisas incr√≠veis podem ser criadas a partir de diferentes materiais e vendidas em troca de dinheiro ‚Äì o qual voc√™ pode reinvestir na f√°brica para obter mais m√°quinas, mais funcion√°rios e expandir o seu neg√≥cio. Uma experi√™ncia aberta sandbox V√° com calma: essa √© uma experi√™ncia sandbox em que voc√™ pensa, reflete e mexe nas coisas at√© conseguir deixar as coisas do jeito que quiser. Forne√ßa produtos para clientes num mercado em constante mudan√ßa, produzindo mais de 50 tipos √∫nicos de produtos feitos com in√∫meras partes e pe√ßas ‚Äì sendo que todos podem ser criados com diferentes materiais e m√©todos de produ√ß√£o. N√£o existem duas f√°bricas iguais. M√£os pequenas, sonhos grandes Comece com uma pequena oficina e a transforme numa f√°brica cheia de oficinas. Desbloqueie m√°quinas cada vez mais sofisticadas, acrescente ainda mais m√©todos de produ√ß√£o e, o mais importante, crie mais espa√ßo. Em breve voc√™ ter√° v√°rias linhas de produ√ß√£o, produzindo centenas de produtos avan√ßados todos os dias e observando com alegria os seus funcion√°rios fofinhos realizarem o trabalho pesado. All Price Information

PriceÔºö2,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

Plan sun and moon positions before you arrive. Predict golden hour, moonrise, and light direction‚Äîplus widgets that keep key times visible at a glance. Know where the light will be‚Äîbefore you go. Solar Arc is a sun and moon planning tool built for people who care about timing, direction, and alignment. Instead of guessing or arriving too late, you can predict exactly how light will move across a location‚Äîhours or days in advance. Whether you‚Äôre scouting, planning a shoot, or timing a sunset or moonrise, Solar Arc gives you clarity before you commit. -- Plan with Precision ‚Ä¢ Live Sun & Moon Arc Visualization See real-time solar and lunar paths with compass-based direction. ‚Ä¢ Golden Hour & Blue Hour Forecasts Know the precise windows when light is at its best. ‚Ä¢ Moonrise & Moonset Planning Track lunar timing and position for night and landscape work. ‚Ä¢ Forecasting & Location Planning Preview sun and moon paths for any date, anywhere. ‚Ä¢ Offline Access All core planning tools work without a connection in the field.

J√° imaginou como √© estar na linha da frente da seguran√ßa nacional? Em Black Border 2, voc√™ assume o papel de um agente da Pol√≠cia de Fronteira, enfrentando situa√ß√µes desafiantes a cada turno. Com visuais detalhados e jogabilidade envolvente, este jogo oferece uma experi√™ncia realista incompar√°vel que coloca voc√™ no centro da a√ß√£o. Assuma a responsabilidade de proteger as fronteiras do seu pa√≠s contra o contrabando ilegal. Cada dia traz novos desafios, onde pensamento r√°pido e vis√£o agu√ßada s√£o as suas melhores ferramentas. Voc√™ √© mais do que um simples agente de fronteira ‚Äî voc√™ √© a √∫ltima linha de defesa. Inspe√ß√£o detalhada de documentos: Analise cuidadosamente passaportes, autoriza√ß√µes e outros documentos para decidir quem pode entrar e quem deve ser barrado. Dete√ß√£o de contrabando: Realize buscas minuciosas em ve√≠culos e inspe√ß√µes pessoais para capturar criminosos que tentam contrabandear mercadorias ilegais. entry.title: FoodyLife: The Food Diary App
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö1,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí Gratuito [Gratuito ~ 1,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöGratuito

Application Description

You will be able to explore your eating habits visually and improve your eating habits. No calories and no numbers are shown in the app! Features: + Beautifully minimalist food diary app + In-App Camera And Filter + No calories No Pressure + Visualizes all your diets and shows your diet balance clearly! + Crazy and Interactive Foody Face + Learn how to eat mindfully and correctly right now! Don‚Äôt make Foody Face angry! Tap download right now! ---------- The inspiration behind FoodyLife is that nowadays people pay little attention to what they eat and often eat unhealthy food. Although there are many similar apps on the market (e.g. Fitness App, Calorie counter...), most of them focus mainly on ‚Äúnumbers‚Äù, such as how many calories the user has eaten and how long the user should exercise to get rid of those calories, or sending the user notifications when they should get up to exercise or if they have eaten too much. FoodyLife‚Äô is an app that helps users track their daily diet by allowing them to keep their own food diary. The app shows neither calories nor numbers; instead, users have only to take a picture, enter their diet information, then they are able their overall diet balance. It is very simple and highly effective. Users can explore their eating habits visually, improving self-consciousness about eating habits.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Afterplace
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö7,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 0,99¬†‚Ç¨ [0,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 7,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö0,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

An open world adventure game filled with silly characters and terrible secrets. Afterplace is an adventurous indie game for mobile devices. It's a huge open world, full of hidden secrets, treasures, and creatures. You'll run around the woods, fight monsters, and talk to ostensibly shady characters! All from your pocket! Be warned though - you never know what the forest might be hiding, and not all trails are paved. Labyrinths and dungeons are tucked away in the most concealed nooks. There are no waypoints in Afterplace. You'll have to forge your own path. Afterplace has been designed from the ground up to be a fast, fluid, beautiful experience for mobile. There are no virtual buttons. You can move and attack by touching anywhere. You can tap objects directly to interact or attack, use two thumbs like a traditional controller, or control the game with a physical gamepad. The game will adapt dynamically to your play style. Pick up and set down the game at your own pace, it will always save your progress. Afterplace is made to feel like a full-fledged indie adventure game that fits in your pocket. About the Author: Afterplace is made by one person, Evan Kice. A former software engineer from Austin TX, Evan quit his job (to the dismay of his friends and family) and has been working full time on Afterplace since early 2019. The initial game released in December of 2022, but Evan plans on continuing to support and polish the game when he can!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad
